title: Prawn noodle stir-fry
description: Not many suppers are faster than a stir-fry and this prawn noodle recipe scores just as highly on taste.
ingredients: 120g packet Blue Dragon Chinese Dynasty Kung Po Sauce (from Morrisons, Sainsburyâ€™s and Tesco)
2 x 150g packs Amoy Straight-To-Wok Rice Noodles

method.Step 1: Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a wok or large frying pan over a medium heat. Add the egg and stir until scrambled. Remove and set aside.

method.Step 2: Heat another tablespoon of oil, then add 200g large, cooked and peeled prawns and the Kung Po Sauce. Simmer for 1 minute, then stir in the dry-roasted peanuts and three-quarters of the spring onions.

method.Step 3: Return the egg to the pan, add the Amoy Straight-To-Wok Rice Noodles and toss well for 1 minute. Divide between wide bowls and garnish with the remaining spring onions. Serve with lime wedges to squeeze over.
